sentences.en: Cast not away therefore your confidence , which hath great recompense of reward.
sentences.cn: 所以你们不可丢弃勇敢的心.存这样的心必得大赏赐.

sentences.en: He received $ 2000 in recompense for the damage to his car.
sentences.cn: 他收到二千元作为对他汽车损坏的赔偿.

sentences.en: He was given ￡1 000 in recompense for his loss.
sentences.cn: 他得到1,000英镑作为对他损失的补偿.

sentences.en: I'll recompense myself for the way in which I have been brought up.
sentences.cn: 我可以补偿一下教育我的那种方式使我受到的损失.

sentences.en: If they succeed in court, they will be fully recompensed for their loss.
sentences.cn: 如果他们在法庭上胜诉，他们的损失就会得到全额赔偿。

sentences.en: She received a gift as recompense.
sentences.cn: 作为报酬,她得到了一件礼物.

sentences.en: Substantial damages were paid in recompense.
The court's decision binds them to recompense us for our losses.
sentences.cn: 根据法院的裁决,他们必须赔偿我方的损失.

sentences.en: The fees offered by the NHS do not recompense dental surgeons for their professional time.
sentences.cn: 国民医疗保健系统所支付的费用中不涵盖牙科诊疗费用。

sentences.en: The firm will recompense you for your traveling expenses.
There must be adequate recompense for workers who lose their jobs.
sentences.cn: 必须给失业的工人足够的补偿。

sentences.en: They gave him money in recompense for his trouble.
sentences.cn: 他们给他钱以酬劳他的辛苦.
他们收到一千英镑的补偿.

sentences.en: They received ￡500 in recompense for the damage to their house.
sentences.cn: 他们因房屋受损而收到五百镑的赔偿费.

sentences.en: We had to recompense the peasants for the loss of their goats.
sentences.cn: 我们得赔偿农民损失的山羊.

sentences.en: Would you accept this as a little recompense for all the trouble you have taken?
sentences.cn: 请你收下这个,以作为对你辛苦的一点酬谢.

trans.tran_en: something that you give to someone for trouble or losses that you have caused them, or as a reward for their help
to give someone a payment for trouble or losses that you have caused them, or a reward for their efforts to help you
